title: Yun-Ting Yeh
text:
Ph.D. Candidate
University of Arizona
 Tucson, AZ


Welcome!
I am a Ph.D. candidate in Economics at the University of Arizona.
My research interests are in environmental and energy economics and empirical industrial organization. My current work studies regulatory uncertainty and facility adjustment frictions in water quality enforcement.
I received my M.A. in Economics from the University of Tokyo, B.A. in Economics from National Taiwan University, and B.B.A. in Business Economics from City University of Hong Kong.
You can contact me at yyeh@arizona.edu.
